feed.title: Homepage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhancement: support breaking changes in wg-easy v15 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5343
  • Fix: make gluetun port_forwarded opt-in by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5345

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.3.0...v1.3.2

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump prettier from 3.5.2 to 3.5.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5368
  • Chore(deps): Bump luxon from 3.5.0 to 3.6.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5365
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump tailwind-scrollbar from 4.0.1 to 4.0.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5366
  • Feature: Trilium Service widget by @perfectra1n in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5380
  • Feature: Proxmox status & stats integration by @albinmedoc in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5385
  • Change: use glances rss instead of data for process memory reporting by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5392
  • Documentation: fix beszel documentation typo by @lukyjay in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5400
  • Enhancement: add enableMediaControl flag to hide play/pause controls for emby/jellyfin by @andrebuerger in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5402
  • Change: preserve trailing slash in custom api calls by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5410
  • Feature: Komodo widget by @aensley in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5407
  • Enhancement: add kubernetes support to portainer widget by @albinmedoc in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5414
  • Enhancement: improve glances info widget spacing by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5425
  • Enhancement: include ua for outlook ical integrations by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5444
  • Enhancement: add links to sonarr and radarr calendar widget items by @mpmckinney in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5448
  • Enhancement: sort qBittorrent leechProgress by @AdamWHY2K in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5456
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-react-hooks from 5.1.0 to 5.2.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5467
  • Chore(deps): Bump systeminformation from 5.25.11 to 5.27.7 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5469
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump prettier from 3.5.3 to 3.6.2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5468
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-prettier from 5.2.6 to 5.5.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5471
  • Chore(deps): Bump react-i18next from 11.18.6 to 15.5.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5470
  • Fix: increase color popover z-index by @duckimann in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5489
  • Fix: fix glances info when cpu = 0 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5506
  • Enhancement: support for new grafana alerting api by @Lappihuan in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5476
  • Tweak: Improve ownership check and chown handling for .next dir by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5513

New Contributors

  • @perfectra1n made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5380
  • @albinmedoc made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5385
  • @lukyjay made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5400
  • @andrebuerger made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5402
  • @aensley made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5407
  • @AdamWHY2K made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5456
  • @duckimann made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5489
  • @Lappihuan made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5476

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.3.2...v1.4.0

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: fix cpu percent for Proxmox stats by @vhsdream in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5528
  • Enhancement: Add extra details to jellyfin's now playing music by @AdamWHY2K in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5557
  • Feature: wallos service widget by @SimpleAnecdote in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5562
  • Fix: Handle Romm v3.10.0 filesize breaking change by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5565
  • Feature: Filebrowser service widget by @albinmedoc in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5546
  • Fixhancement: restore native scrolling, background by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5573
  • Fix: fix error handling in Portainer Kubernetes widget by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5584
  • Chore(deps): Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.9 to 1.15.11 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5597
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-import from 2.31.0 to 2.32.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5598
  • Chore(deps): Bump next from 15.3.1 to 15.4.5 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5601
  • Chore(deps): Bump dockerode from 4.0.4 to 4.0.7 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5599
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump postcss from 8.5.3 to 8.5.6 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5600

New Contributors

  • @SimpleAnecdote made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5562

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.4.0...v1.4.1

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: properly handle classlist with light theme by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5612
  • Fix: set body background color by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5611

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.4.1...v1.4.2

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhancement: handle evcc 0.207 breaking change by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5619
  • Fix: properly handle UptimeRobot errors by @yannhodiesne in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5621
  • Fix bg opacity calculation by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5622
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5614

New Contributors

  • @yannhodiesne made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5621

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.4.2...v1.4.3
